name: Open Trail Data
tagline: A home for the Open Trail Data community.
body:
> Parks and trails are a cornerstone of public health and quality of life. The Open Trail System Specification (OpenTrails) helps citizens get outdoors to enjoy them.

### Learn More

* [Open Trails System Specification](http://www.codeforamerica.org/specifications/trails)

### Get Started

* [Enroll now in the OpenTrails Course! Begins August 6th 2014!](http://www.codeforamerica.org/specifications/trails)

* [Convert & Validate Your Data](http://open-trails.codeforamerica.org)

### News

* [OpenTrails on the Outside Blog!](http://www.outsideonline.com/outdoor-adventure/the-current/footprint/Strava-is-Just-the-Start-The-Promise-of-Open-Trail-Data.html)
* [OpenTrails Presentation at ESRI UC 2014](https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/30204300/Esri-UC-Slides-2014.pdf)

### Projects

* PDX Trails
* TrailEditor
* Trails Mobile
* To the Trails
* Transit & Trails

### Products

* OuterSpatial

### Code

* 

### Tools

### History

* Open Trail System Specification 1.0 

### Partners

* Code for America
* ESRI
* Trailhead Labs
